title: Sony’s new LinkBuds S reportedly launching soon with ANC and a lightweight design
content:
In February, Sony unveiled a new pair of earbuds called LinkBuds, featuring a unique “Open Ring” design. The earbuds were geared toward users who don’t like the super tight seal created by the silicone tips. Now Sony is gearing up to launch new LinkBuds, but with a more palatable design — clearly in an attempt

The post Sony’s new LinkBuds S reportedly launching soon with ANC and a lightweight design appeared first on XDA.
